```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```


###Name of the variables

```{r}
print(names(merged_data_82))
```
###Research on Price

```{r}
Price_rice = merged_data_82$Price_rice_per_kg
Price_beer = merged_data_82$Price_beer
Price_water = merged_data_82$Price_water_per_bottle
Price_cig = merged_data_82$Price_cig_20_pack
Price_cheese = merged_data_82$Price_cheese_per_kg
Price_egg = merged_data_82$Price_eggs_dozen
Price_milk = merged_data_82$Price_milk_per_liter
Price_bread = merged_data_82$Price_bread_halfkg
```

Range of the Price, normalization of the price:

```{r}
range(Price_rice)
range(Price_beer)
range(Price_water)
range(Price_cig)
range(Price_cheese)
range(Price_egg)
range(Price_milk)
range(Price_bread)
U_rice = Price_rice/(4.56-0.63)
U_beer = Price_beer/(8.27-0.45)
U_water = Price_water/(2.46-0.17)
U_cig = Price_cig/(29.15-0.5)
U_cheese = Price_cheese/(27.26-1.37)
U_egg = Price_egg/(6.88-0.79)
U_milk = Price_milk/(3.39-0.46)
U_bread = Price_bread/(3.56-0.16)
```
Graph 1: Normalized price:


```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,8))
boxplot(U_rice)
boxplot(U_beer)
boxplot(U_water)
boxplot(U_cig)
boxplot(U_cheese)
boxplot(U_egg)
boxplot(U_milk)
boxplot(U_bread)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
boxplot(U_rice,U_beer,U_water,U_cig,U_cheese,U_egg,U_milk,U_bread,
main = "Unified price of different products",
ylab = "Price",
# names = c("Price of rice (1kg)", "Price of imported beer", "Price of water (1.5 liter)", "Price of cigarettes (20 packs)", "Price of cheese (1kg)", "Price of egg (a dozen)", "Price of milk (1 liter)", "Price of white bread (500 grams)"))
names = c("Rice", "Beer", "Water", "Cig", "Cheese", "Egg", "Milk", "Bread"))
```


Simple linear model (Cost of living vs. Price):

```{r}
ggplot(merged_data_82, aes(x = Cost_of_Living_Index, y = Price_rice_per_kg)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(merged_data_82, aes(x = Cost_of_Living_Index, y = Price_water_per_bottle)) +
```

###Research on Macro data


```{r}

  ggtitle("Relationship between GDP per capita and Cost of living index") +  
  xlab("GDP per capita") +
  ylab("Cost of living index") +
  geom_point()
```
